title: OpenAI Debuts First Model Using Chips From Nvidia Rival Cerebras
description: OpenAI is releasing its first artificial intelligence model that runs on chips from semiconductor startup Cerebras Systems Inc., part of a push by the ChatGPT maker to broaden the pool of chipmakers it works with beyond Nvidia Corp.

title: World Governments Summit: Flying cars and robots move from science fiction to reality
description: With advances in artificial intelligence beginning to reshape mobility, Dr Hongdi Brian Gu, Vice Chairman of the Board of Directors and Co-president of XPeng, told Euronews at the World Governments Summit that technologies once confined to science fiction are moving closer to real-world deployment.
content:

title: 'AI-Generated, Fake News': Shashi Tharoor REACTS Over Fake Video Of Him Praising Pakistan For India Match Boycott Shared By Pakistani Journalist
